notes: Gift of Cyrus Ebrahim Zadeh, Nov. 9, 2009.
Folios 1b-13a in cursive Naskh; Folio 21b and following in Nastaʻliq; 15-16 lines in written area 14 x 7 cm.
Folios 1b-13a; Folios 13b-21a blank; Folios 21b-119a; Folios 119b-122b blank; Folios 123a-292a; Folios 292b-294a blank; Folios 294b-297a.
Binding: sewn with loos pages; cover lacking.
item.title: [Lawyer's notebook from Iran].
summary: Laws from the era of Reza Shah Pahlavi, Shah of Iran, ruled 1921-1944.
medium: 397 leaves (15-16 lines), paper : disbound ; 17.4 x 11 cm
contents: Folios 1b-13a. Ijrā-yi Qānūn-i Taṣarrufāt-i ʻUdvānī -- Folios 22a-92a [Miscellaneous Iranian Law] -- Folio 93a-113b. Qānūn-i Tasrīʻ-i Muḥākamāt dar Sivvum-i Tīr bi-taṣvīb-i Majlis-i Shūrā-yi Millī va 12 Tīr 1309 bi-Ṣiḥḥah-i Mulūkānah muvashshaḥ gardīdah ast -- Folio 117a-119a Niẓāmnāmah-i Vukalā-yi Maḥdūd-i ʻAdlīyah -- Folio 123a-143a. Qānūn-i Uṣūl-i Tashkīlāt -- Folio 144a-158b. Niẓāmnāmah-i Ijrāʼ-i Mufād-i Rasmī-i Lāzim al-Ijrāʼ-i Vazīr-i ʻAdlīyah, Naẓar bi-Māddah-i 213 Bahman māh-i 1308 Muqarrar Mīdārad -- Folio 159b-161b. Qānūn-i Mujāzāt Rājiʻ bi-As̲qāl-i Māl-i Ghayr-i Muṣavvabah, 5 va 8 Farvardīn 1308 -- Folio 162a-169b. Qānūn-i Ḥakamīyat dar Jalasah-i Laylah-i Bīst va Nuhum-i Isfand māh-i Hazār Sīṣad va Shish-i Shamsī -- Folio 170a-175b. Qānūn-i Iṣlāḥ-i Ḥakamīyat -- Folio 176a-185a. Qānūn-i Mujāzāt-i Irtishāʼ -- Folio 186a-195b. Qānūn-i Muddaʻī bih Muṣavvabah-i 26 va 28 Isfand 1308 -- Folio 196b-297a. Uṣūl-i Muḥākamāt-i Ḥuqūqī dar Maḥākim-i Ibtidāʼī.
